title: App Downloader
description: A muOS application for downloading apps directly from their GitHub releases.

title: Aesthetic
description: A muOS application for creating minimalistic themes directly on your handheld.

title: Scrappy
description: An artwork scraper featuring a Skyscraper backend. Built with LOVE2D for muOS.

title: RomM
description: Browse your game catalog, download titles, and sync your saves seamlessly

title: Bluetooth
description: A simple tool to manage Bluetooth connections on gaming devices running muOS, allowing you to easily connect and control Bluetooth devices.

title: Wifi Hotspot
description: A simple tool to create a WiFi hotspot on gaming devices running muOS, providing a fast and stable network connection for other devices.

title: APlayer
description: Audio player for MUOS on Love2D

title: Rethemer
description: A recoloring tool for alternate themes

title: HowLongToBeat
description: A muOS application that allows you to check game completion times from HowLongToBeat.com directly on your handheld device. Search for games, view completion times, and get detailed information about your favorite games.

title: WiFi Manager
description: A muOS application for managing WiFi connections on your handheld device. Easily connect to WiFi networks, view saved networks, and manage your wireless connections.

title: Migration Tool
description: A utility tool for muOS that helps with data migration and system management. Transfer data between devices and manage system settings efficiently.
